headline: Is Best Buy (BBY) Offering Value After Prolonged Share Price Weakness
summary: If you are wondering whether Best Buy's share price actually reflects its underlying worth, you are not alone. This article is designed to help you size that up calmly and clearly. At a last close of US$64.87, the stock has seen returns of 4.9% decline over 7 days, 3.9% decline over 30 days, a 6.2% decline year to date, and a 23.3% decline over 1 year, with a 15.1% decline over 3 years and a 31.2% decline over 5 years. Recent coverage has focused on Best Buy's position in consumer...
